title: What is the original video for the song Vayyari Bhama from the movie Thammudu? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually this is not the original. Ramana Gogula had released this song as an album which was very popular on ‘Radio City’, way before it was used in the movie ‘Thammudu’. The lyrics of the first original version are as follows: Hey pilla nee peru lovely Bedi laga unnayi nee kallu Hey pilla nee nadaka chuste Naa gundelo Jallu jallu. Vayarri Bhama Nee Hamsa Nadaka Enduke Ee thondara thondara Rathri vela ee chikatlo Enduko naa gundalo Alajada. Somehow the original song is no where to be found. I guess it’s some copyright issues with the movie. A person who has heard the original song will not like the movie version. That’s at least 2 curious people looking for the original! :-)
